articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Kindle Scribe Colorsoft brings color e-ink to Amazon’s 11-inch e-reader - Ars Technica
articles.description: Amazon has added color e-ink to its devices more slowly than its competitors.

articles.author: Ashley Belanger
articles.title: US taking 25% cut of Nvidia chip sales “makes no sense,” experts say - Ars Technica
articles.description: Trump’s odd Nvidia reversal may open the door for China to demand Blackwell access.

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Sperm donor with rare cancer mutation fathered nearly 200 children in Europe - Ars Technica
articles.description: Children with the mutation have up to a 90% chance of developing cancer by age 60.

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Adobe brings Photoshop, Express and Acrobat features to ChatGPT - TechCrunch
articles.description: ChatGPT's 800 million plus userbase can now use Adobe's apps to modify images and PDFs
articles.content: Adobe is doubling down on its strategy of using AI to bring more users into its product ecosystem. The company on Wednesday said it is adding features from Photoshop, Express and Acrobat to ChatGPT, … [+1972 chars]
